modName: Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music - Sound Overhaul
summary: Dark Mode brings skyrim into a dark combat music and sound effects from the awesome Two Step's from hell a very Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul that makes you beg for enemies so you just fight with darkness!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#ff0000][size=4]﻿Dark Mode - Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul[/size][/color][/font]﻿[img]https://wallscover.com/images/dark-wallpaper-15.jpg[/img]
                                           By wallscover.com                    ﻿

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Dark Mode brings skyrim into a dark combat music and sound effects from the awesome Two Step's from hell a very Intense Combat Music & Sound Overhaul that makes you beg for enemies so you just fight with darkness![/size][/font][color=#00ff00]Music copyright goes to Two Step's From hell especialy thanks to marcus Vandiloft for granting me the support and ability to use their track's![/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=3]Includes:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*]Over +50 Track for normal combat & Dragon combat music!
[*]Level up music
[*]Reward music
[*]Critical Hit Sound
[*]Shout words music
[*]Main theme replaced with black heart

[*]and much more to enjoy
[*]and im [color=#00ff00]Back[/color] xd
[/list]
